subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus
author: Elabeth
full_text:
I thought it was pretty neat that it repeated the word "worry" when
Ryan asked if it was worried they'd bring in a priest.
What are the odds of that just based on environmental readings? If I
had an extra $200 laying around I'd be buying myself one to play with.
~Elabeth

On Tue, Aug 12, 2008 at 7:41 AM, Fransen, Debbie
<debbie.fransen@...> wrote:
> I don't know how many of the members watch Paranormal State, but they used
> a new piece of equipment called The Ovilus. You guys have got to check this
> out. Go to www.digitaldowsing.com. I am not really sure who these guys are,
> and
> where they came up with this. To me, it sounds kind of like Frank's Box, but
> not the same.
> Frank, please take a look at this, and tell us what  you think.
> I don't understand how it works......
> Deb
